name: Patrick Murimi
bio: Postman Student Leader | GDSC Web Development Team Lead | Frontend Web Developer

links.name: GitHub: Let's Collaborate on Open Source

milestones.title: Became a Gold fellow at THE ROOM
milestones.description: After completing an ALX tech program, I was selected to become a Gold fellow at the room, The Room fellowship is a community of ALX graduates that have successfully graduated from its programs, and the Gold fellowship consists of the top 5-10% of the graduates. I'm very happy for this opportunity and feel very privileged to be joining the top tech talent pool in Africa. Looking forward to what this experience unfolds! More info on their website: https://tech.theroom.com/gold-fellowship

milestones.title: Became a Postman Student Leader
milestones.description: Got accepted to be a Postman Student Leader, a student program offered by Postman, that aims to promote API literacy through workshops and events on campus

milestones.title: Got my first internship!
milestones.description: I got an internship as a frontend developer, a fully remote role for ExpatSwap, a fintech company based in Estonia, Europe. Tech stack: Angular.
